user.title: Confirm Callback URL

pat.title: Enter Personal Access Token
pat.description:
To connect SmartThings to Home Assistant, you need to create a Personal Access Token.

**Steps:**
1. Click here to open the [SmartThings Token Creation Page]({token_url})
2. Click "Generate new token"
3. Enter a name (e.g., "Home Assistant")
4. Select the following authorized scopes:
   - **Devices** (all permissions)
5. Click "Generate token"
6. Copy the token and paste it below

⚠️ **Important**: The token will only be shown once. Make sure to copy it before closing the page.

For more detailed instructions, see the [documentation]({component_url}).
